registry.title: Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) Field Name Registry
Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) Field Name Registry
registry.registration_rule: Specification Required for Permanent registrations, Expert Review for Provisional registrations.
registry.note: See Section 16.3 of for more information on defining and registering new HTTP Fields.
New field names, along with changes to existing ones, can be requested using the registry interface or the mailing list defined in .

The "Structured Type" column indicates the type of the field (per ), if any, and may be "Dictionary", "List", or "Item".
Note that field names beginning with characters other than ALPHA or "*" will not be able to be represented as a Structured Fields Token and therefore may be incompatible with being mapped into field values that refer to it.
